name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xiongan New Area Netizen Contribution
I am just an ordinary employee, but my passport has been confiscated for nearly half a year, and it is not returned even if I want to ask for it. During this period, many people complained but to no avail.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
At 1 a.m. on June 28, at Beijing South Railway Station
A netizen witnessed the arrest of petitioners who went to Beijing to appeal.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: During this time, a police car passed by and simply ignored what was happening.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
On June 26, a netizen in Yangzhou posted that he was raped by a police officer in the police station in January 2022.
The police station staff said that the Municipal Public Security Bureau and the Discipline Inspection Commission have intervened in the investigation, and the police officer involved has been transferred from the police station after the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 28, Southwest Forestry University. The grief-stricken mother collapsed at the school gate.
According to the description on Douyin, his younger brother was a first-year graduate student at Southwest Forestry University. He died in the school on the 25th. The cause of death is unknown. The parents asked for an explanation but to no avail, and he was forcibly taken away.
According to eyewitness students, everyone entering the school today must check the school code and DingTalk. The school teacher warned the students before class not to discuss this matter. If found, credits will be deducted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
June 27, Chuxiong City, Yunnan Province.
A UP host released a video saying that on the morning of June 21, he found that the local urban management vehicle was on the road without a license plate, so he stopped the urban management driver from driving and called 122 to report the incident.
The UP host asked: This is illegal, right?
The traffic police said: I dare not tell you this.

According to the UP host, the traffic police comrade on the 27th talked to him, but no specific punishment has been imposed on the vehicle in question so far.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another netizen added that at 1 a.m. on April 20, there was a long queue in front of the Petition Bureau. I don’t know what happened, but there are often long queues here. This time it was more exaggerated. "I started living near Beijing South Railway Station before the epidemic. There are police cars with various license plates from all over the country all year round. It is said that they are all here to claim (arrest people). There are also a lot of "special security guards" patrolling the streets. I don’t know what they are doing."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
A Beijing netizen discovered that the road sign leading to Sitong Bridge was also replaced

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Contributions from netizens
On June 28, a university in Shenyang City, Liaoning Province
Students were asked to rate a police officer they did not know well and collect screenshots based on dormitories.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 28, Huangchao Mansion Community, Wuzhou, Guangxi. 
Residents protest collectively

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that this was to protest against a barbecue restaurant in the community that had too much smoke and affected people's lives.
